name: ÜberTuber
description:
A game made for the GGJ 2023

In a near future the planet surface is barren and unable to sustain life. 

Stuck in an underground greenhouse you have to survive off edible roots planted in barely fertile ground. 

Cling to your life in a farming simulator like you've never seen before!

ÜberTuber is a single-player experience that can be played with a mouse and a keyboard or any gamepad.
